review: Visited for my mother regular heart check up. Charges heavily at blood tests, get the test done outside, other than that it was overall a good experience.

****** **** ** *** ******** ** ** * ********** ** *********** ** ** ****** *** ********* never listen to the patients and is always interested in writing up a series of tests. The radiologist after doing the 2D Echo and ECG with NTPro blood test told to recheck with Sanjay Bhat about the holter test which he told us to get done with. We went to him enquiring the same, instead of checking the reports, he started raising his voice **** *** ** *** *********** ** ********* ** ********* *** *********** ** ** *** ********** *********** ** *** **** ** **** ********** ** **** *** *** **** *** ***** **** **** *** ***** ***** *** ** ***** ** *** 

The cost of the 2D Echo, ECG and NTPro was 8900.00***** ********* **** ** ** ********** **** ** *** **** **** ** ********* ** *** ***** *** **** ** *** ** *** ***** ** ** *** *** ******* *** ****** **** ***** 

I was in constant followup with my nephrologist and was following his advice still he kept on shouting and blaming us that we are not attentive.

***** **** ** ****** ***** **** ***. * ***** ****** *** ** *********** ******* * ************ *** *** **** *** ** *** ** ***** ***************** ** **** **** **** ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr.Sanjay Bhat is dedicated,thoughtful  and compassionate Doctor.
On 3rd Jan 2023,my dad  got admitted at aster for chest pain immediately did first aid followed by angiogram and angioplasty with stent everything was done so fast.Thanks a ton for his excellent treatment on-time, he is a lifesaver.sending him heartfelt thankfulness and we'll be forever grateful to him
Thanks
Smitha pawar
D/o B.Mohan rao( patient)

i thank doctor sanjay bhatt he's very friendly and explained very well ....i take my mother  here for angiogram procceed ur he did very well we're satisfied my mom is feeling better now....if u were finding cardiologist plz go ahead

review: Dr. Sanjay Bhat has very large ego(Head weight). He does not want listen patient end, only talks what he want. And if u go to heart related problem he make big fuss out of it and gives lost expensive test which of course comes negative.

Every one will say he is very rude but I think he is very polite person his voice is bold the people think he is speaking rudely Iam a plumnomary hypertension patient before going to him I was not walking still 6min and I was not doing any work after going to him I can walk still 1 hr and 
Iam working and my lifestyle is like a normal person thanks to him I wish him to develop his aim

review: Doctor was informative. Explained clearly about the problem .  Treatment was and hospitality was good.
Too much wait time without any important fact only sister mentions that Doctor is out for procedure. More than 2 hours waiting is very common that too without sufficient reason.
